s recommended songs will be loaded as a playlist
and update automatically by the local LR2 clear data.
Be carefull when you do not send your clears on purpose.
Note that your clears and scores will not send to LR2IR.
You can recover the data by the official update method if you have a problem.
Are you sure you want to continue?
